SELECT CAT_C, CAT_NAME, CAT_P FROM CATEGORY WHERE CAT_P IS NOT NULL AND CAT_P = #{cat_c}

SELECT RN, B.BOA_NUM, M.MEM_NAME, B.CAT_C, B.CAT_NAME, B.CAT_NAME_C, B.CAT_P, B.BOA_TITLE, B.BOA_CONTENT, B.BOA_DATE_REG, B.BOA_DATE_UP, B.EVE_NAME, B.BOA_HIT, B.BOA_REP_NUM, B.REP_UP, B.REP_DOWN, B.BOA_UP, B.BOA_DOWN FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(BOARD PK_BOA_NUM)*/ ROWNUM RN, B.BOA_NUM, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME, B.CAT_C, B.CAT_NAME, B.CAT_NAME_C, B.CAT_P, B.BOA_TITLE, B.BOA_CONTENT, B.BOA_DATE_REG, B.BOA_DATE_UP, B.EVE_NAME, B.BOA_HIT, B.BOA_REP_NUM, B.REP_UP, B.REP_DOWN, B.BOA_UP, B.BOA_DOWN FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE CAT_P = #{cat_c} AND
ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE CAT_P = #{cat_c} AND boa_num > 0

SELECT B.BOA_NUM, M.MEM_NAME, B.CAT_C, B.CAT_NAME, B.CAT_NAME_C, B.CAT_P, B.BOA_TITLE, B.BOA_CONTENT, B.BOA_DATE_REG, B.BOA_DATE_UP, B.EVE_NAME, B.BOA_HIT, B.BOA_REP_NUM, B.REP_UP, B.REP_DOWN, B.BOA_UP, B.BOA_DOWN FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE B.BOA_NUM = #{boa_num}
